markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Kobold Warrior](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3072)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The typical kobold trains in tunnel fighting, learning to use simple weapons that are effective in narrow spaces. Kobolds are capable of landing sneaky strikes against unsuspecting foes, but are just as quick to scamper off to safety when they don't outnumber their enemies by at least two to one.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Kobold_Warrior.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Kobold Warrior](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3072)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=759" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 210 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +3; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sakvroth](/Languages.aspx?ID=118)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +2, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** -1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72) (20 bullets), [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +3 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +3 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 7

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +3,
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sling +5 ([Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +5 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing

**Scamper** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The kobold warrior is adjacent to at least one enemy; **Effect** The kobold warrior Strides up to their Speed plus 5 feet and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement. They must end this movement in a space that's not adjacent to any enemy.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The kobold warrior deals an extra 1d4 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-435" />
name: Kobold Warrior
